column1: Kings Court referred to the courts of the King of Númenor in Armenelos
column2: where grew the Nimloth of Númenor.

column1: After Sauron had been taken to Númenor and began to acquire power over Ar-Pharazôn
column2: he urged the king to cut down Nimloth.  When Isildur heard of Saurons purpose he entered the Kings Court one night
column4: and took a fruit from the tree.  Isildur had to fight his way out of the court; afterwards the king yielded to Sauron and had the tree felled.
